snippet.title: Adventures of Bertram Fiddle - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Bertram Fiddle, Leading Victorian Explorator, on his hunt to uncover London's most elusive serial killer, known only as Geoff the Murderer.
A dark humoured murder mystery, full of dark humour, murder and mystery, in the finest of point and click traditions.
Download for PC/Mac at http://store.steampowered.com/app/354680
Or iPhone/iPad https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/bertram-fiddle-episode-1-dreadly/id930404329?mt=8


Follow us on Twitter @BertramFiddle
